item.title: Punk against Putin: Criminal State – Путин
item.description: Almost all Russians love their country, but not all love their leader(s). Especially not that one. Criminal State (est. 2010) makes it clear. Lyrics below, with translation here. Explicit lyrics. Путин (2014) We want to live freely so that no one hinders us so that all scum dies the f*** out the cop and politician suck it punks don’t love Putin they reject all the bulls*** governments can f*** off all politicians to prison
